name: hollis
text: Yeah, supposedly, but this is one of many things that I suspect Urbandictionary.com just made up.  Nobody had actually performed a blumpkin before the site went up, and now people all over are going "eww... people actually do that?"  Blumpkins: the new alligators in the sewers.

name: cdl146
text: I have a friend who claims to have received one. Given the caliber of "women" he brings around, I'm inclined to believe him.

name: spinynorman
text:
I have a friend who insisted he had received one several times. He was from the ghettos of Boston. He claimed the key was that you had to drop "small bombs."

Until he filled me in on the definition I always assumed "Blumpkin" was the name of the mayor of some children show's fictional village.

name: saru
text:
Man, the original text list of retarded, inane "sexual" acts was circulated on _Usenet_
I don't know if the "Dirty Sanchez" existed before then, and I don't want to know.

name: achilleselbow
text: Regarding a lot of things, I wonder if they existed before the internet. I like to think of history prior to the 80's as being in a state of indeterminacy until someone comes up with something gross on the net, at which point it will be the case that said grossness has existed in some way since ancient times.

name: mattylite
text: I don't know about a lot of things, but I know I heard about all these sex acts before the internet. It's not like information couldn't change hands pre-internet, and it's not like the standards were really any higher when it came to stuff like this. Don't get me wrong, I'm not getting nostalgic for those dark ages-- I mean, shit, back then you had to buy porno.

name: kamet
text: (shudders) Uuugh... buying porno.  Those days were not so fun.  Going into the store.. quietly asking for your mag of choice, or worse, going specifically to a porn store and getting that suspicious, knowing look out of the corner of the proprietor's eye...

name: achilleselbow
text: Nah, way before urban dictionary there was a site called Glossary of Obscure Sexual Terms and I saw Blumpkin on there. Also Arabian Goggles, Rodeo, Houdini, Reverse Houdini, etc.

name: heccibiggs

name: mattylite
text:
[IMGS OFF]

It was a toy. A doll. A little doll. It smelled like Strawberries. I think there were some other characters who smelled like other stuff. Mostly fruit-related. It was like there was a marketing think-tank, and it was right when scratch-n-sniff stickers were popular, and so they made dolls that smelled like various fruits since that mixed the timeless appeal of dolls and the momentary pleasure of smelling chemical imitations of certain fruits imprinted into plastic. They were for girls.
